title: Preserving our national heritage
creator_credit: Cine Service, Balm Paints and Lawrence Reese
brief_description: A comprehensive survey of the work of the National Trust and affiliated bodies. Describes how they are preserving, marking and in some cases making available to the public in various states, Australia’s historic buildings, Aboriginal relics, and rare native flora and fauna. Narrated by John Royle.
